author: niallp
msg: Add phase to -sources.jar and -javadoc.jar generation (looks like this resolves the issue I had with Commons IO where the date/time on the jars in the binary distro were different from the signed versions for the maven repo)

author: hansbak
msg: another try to replace the language properties files by a single xml file. Thanks to the quick fix from Adrian. The accounting one gave the most problems so let us try this one for a couple of days...then we will try the ecommerce and other components again. We expect to have all components converted by the end of this month.
